articles.title: European stocks pick up, dollar slips, investors focus on Russia-Ukraine By Reuters - Investing.com
articles.description: European stocks pick up, dollar slips, investors focus on Russia-Ukraine
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - European stocks opened slightly higher on Tuesday, the dollar eased and gold was just below an 8-month high as investors remained focused on the risk of Russia invading Ukraine.
